entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 this morning then steady. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning then light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 3 this morning then steady. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then flurries beginning overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High zero.
